# Thycotic

Update Secret General Information

Update Secret General Information

Method: Patch

OperationID: SecretsService_UpdateGeneral

EndPoint:

/secrets/{id}/general

Usage: secretFields[]

[{ "dirty": "%secretFields_dirty%", "slug": "%slug%", "value": "%secretFields_value%" }]
